title: La Patrona
overview: Gabriela Su√°rez is the only woman working in the gold mine in her small town. She is a single mother who rebels against all kinds of abuse. A woman of great strength, she must endure a series of calamities that, in order to be overcome, force her to undergo the greatest of transformations, both physically and emotionally. She returns on a quest for revenge and redemption and does everything she can to unmask her main enemy, Antonia Guerra, and become La Patrona.
